Observed at: North Mountain 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
